metadatalist.metadata: Dan Trueman and R. Luke DuBois

method.name: float
method.description:
Left inlet: Does nothing
2nd inlet: Grain rate
3rd inlet: Grain rate variation
4th inlet: Grain length (ms)
5th inlet: Grain length variation
6th inlet: Grain pitch (multiplier)
7th inlet: Grain pitch variation
8th inlet: Grain pan spread

method.name: signal
method.description:
Left inlet: Audio in
2nd inlet: Grain rate
3rd inlet: Grain rate variation
4th inlet: Grain length (ms)
5th inlet: Grain length variation
6th inlet: Grain pitch (multiplier)
7th inlet: Grain pitch variation
8th inlet: Grain pan spread

method.name: ambidirectional
method.description: Allow grains to play backwards and forwards (0), just forwards (1), or just backwards (-1). (0) by default.

method.name: clear
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: delaylength
method.description: Use delaylength_ms instead.

method.name: delaylength_ms
method.description: Constrain how far back in time munger~ looks for grains. The smaller this is, the smaller the largest grain can be. The munger's argument sets the maximum delay length possible (and the default value for delaylength).

method.name: gain
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: maxvoices
method.description: Set an upper limit to the number of simultaneous voices (see voices), and will have some impact on performance if set really high (20 by default). munger~ is hardwired for total maximum of 100 voices.

method.name: minsize
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: note
method.description: Arguments = transposition, gain, pan, attack, decay, sustain level, release

method.name: oneshot
method.description: Use continuous grains or play them one-at-a-time

method.name: position
method.description: Set the playback position within the buffer (between 0 and 1). The default is randomized position (-1)It is possible to get some interesting stretching effects by scrubbing through this with "record" on, and some good transposition effects with "record" off.

method.name: ramptime
method.description: Constrain the length (in ms) of the ramping envelope on each grain. If the grain is smaller than the ramptime, the ramp time will be scaled to half the grain size.

method.name: rand_gain
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: record
method.description: Turn recording on and off. Turning off freezes the buffer. On (1) by default.

method.name: scale
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: smooth
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: state
method.description: Post the values of user controlled variables to the console

method.name: tempered
method.description: TEXT_HERE

method.name: voices
method.description: Set how many grains to allow simultaneously (10 by default). The more, the more expensive. You can smoothly sweep this parameter.
